title: The (Other) Best Games of the Last 10 Years
description: As we build towards our 10 year anniversary in February, we decided to look back at some of the winners of The Besties Game of the Year throughout the decade. Were we right? Were we wrong? Let's find out! Each year we'll take a look at the original winner and decide what we'd put up as an alternate to go against it. You won't believe what we have for 2017! Or maybe you will. Yeah, you probably will.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick, Justin McElroy)
